author: Osborne,Bruce
subject: Exploits of Lupin III Prologue
body:
Well, I decided to give it another shot at writing a Lupin fanfic. This
time it has some promice, here is the Rough Draft to the Prologue:

http://www.thesoyokaze.net/fanfic/LupinIII/Prologue.txt

Its called "Exploits of Lupin III" I took the name from the old LaBlanc
Novel, but it has no relation in story wise. It totally takes place in an
alternate universe as well, and the characters personalilites are
different. I've always wanted to see Lupin as a mean, cold-hearted,
asshole. Jigen as a father figure to Lupin. Plus Fujiko and Lupin are
actually lovers, and its not the strange relationship they hvae in the
anime. Although Lupin mistreats Fujiko from time to time. Zenigeta's
motives for wanting to track down Lupin are different as well (you'll read
it in the prologue). Hope everyone enjoys, please give me your comments.
--------------------------------------
Bruce Osborne
ICQ: 3 1 3 7 9 2 3 7 
Email: saitoh-hajime@neo.rr.com
